author: makortel
body:
This PR removes `TrackerSeedValidator` as it has been obsoleted (long time ago) by `TrackFromSeedProducer`+`MultiTrackValidator`, as configured in
`TrackValidation_cff.py` for trackingOnly mode.

Tested in 9_0_0_pre4, no changes expected in standard workflows.

@rovere @VinInn
title: Remove TrackerSeedValidator as obsolete
